divs: Sighting Detailsk..i was driveing south bound on rt 1 in south kingstown i noticed a very bright object my friend was in the passenger seat and saw it too.. we both determined it was a light in the middle of noth bound and south bound that was lit up 150 feet or so off the ground we thought it to be for constrution but it was 150feet above the woods that are between south bound and north bound so we thought it was strange so as we aproached my exit i decided to go passed my exit 200feet to see it because it was 200 feet passed my exit..so i went into the brake down lane and stoped the car to look at it and my friend and me both stared at it ..at this time is when i noticed i never seen one car on south bound or north bound for tem minutes not one car while we were looking at it so..me and my friend we to the turn around to go back on the north bound as we are going around the turn around at 1 mile an hour im looking up at it im amost underneath it and me and my friend both seen 6 lights just like the new led flash light they have today the ones the are tiny leds but really bright well thats what this was 6 leds it was a saucer the size of 3 medium cars that had 6 lights looked like 5feet from each other going around the top part of this saucer..from far away they aperaed to be 1 light very bright but because we were so close looking up at it thats how we know it was 6 indviduel lights so now we went around the turn around and went north boud for like 1min turned the car around to go south bound still looking at it took my exit still looking at it my house is 500feet from the high way still looking at it drove on my lawn ran in the house got my camra and my friend took his eyes off of it for a sec and it was gone when he looked back ..i got in my car went on to south bound and it was still wasnt anywhere to be seen and me and my friend both noticed trafic was very very hevy on south bound and north bound when the whole time we were looking at it before for 10mins never seen a car on south bound or north........
Summary: unbleaveable,not only did i see it but my friend was in the car with me and saw it too...it was a round object with 6 lights very very bright it was the size of 3 med cars,.
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There were no other sightings in South Kingstown on or around November 30th 1998
